name: The Curse Of Pichal Peri
description:
A forest is cursed by the demonic Pichal Peri.  With A lot of tourists and local residents going missing in the forest, Mirza Shah who is a newly recruited police officer has decided to go into the forest and get rid of all the vicious and evil creatures in the forest. Will he be able to eliminate the evil Pichal Peri ? The player has to explore the forest and find Pichal Peri so she can be eliminated.

Music from www.bensound.com

Witch laugh from www.quicksound.com

Other sfx : www.zapsplat.com
